text: Borgomanero is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Novara in the Italian region Piedmont. It is about northwest of Milan, about northwest of Novara and not far from the border between Lombardy and Piedmont Borgomanero borders the following municipalities: Bogogno, Briga Novarese, Cressa, Cureggio, Fontaneto d'Agogna, Gargallo, Gattico, Gozzano, Invorio, Maggiora, Veruno. ==Twin towns== * Digne-les-Bains, France * Bad Mergentheim, Germany ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Settlements in Novara
title: Borgomanero
